entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET CI Broken on Linux ARM #34316

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround issue with explicitly implemented indexers #34318
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Remove tooltask validation for Entrypoint/EntrypointArgs #34311
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [Containers] validate that the normalized repository name is a meaningful name #34286
    Area-Containers
  • Parse User and Port Container Metadata from special environment variables #34154
    Area-Containers
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable "portable" RID graph when targeting .NET 8 and higher #34279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
